content.rendered:
Delivery Agent Onboarding For Job

Shypr operates as an on-demand shipping application, allowing users to request couriers to deliver items in a fast and efficient manner without having to leave their office or home.

Delivery Agent Onboarding For Job

    Delivery Agent Onboarding Form

    Drivers Will Need to Upload a Copy Of(documents):

    [ninja_form id="3"]

    sing up our newsletter

    Sign up today for hints, tips and the latest product news - plus exclusive special offers.

    Subscription Form

excerpt.rendered: Delivery Agent Onboarding For Job Shypr operates as an on-demand shipping application, allowing users to request couriers to deliver items in a fast and efficient manner without having to leave their office or home. Delivery Agent Onboarding For Job First Name Last Name Email Phone / Mobile Business Address Address 2 City State Zip Code Do you currently drive for Uber, Lyft, Doordash or etc? Agent Type —Please choose an option—Messenger / CourierOwner Operator Type Of Vehicle Used —Please choose an option—MotorbikeSedanSUVMinivanPickup TruckCargo VanBox Truck Vehicle Year Vehicle Make Vehicle Model Vehicle Color License Plate Drivers Will Need to Upload a Copy Of(documents): Driver License Vehicle Registration Insurance Card Vehicle Pic w/ License Plate Do You Have Cargo Insurance? YesNo Areas Covered (City, County) Availability? (how many hours am/pm) How did you hear about us? —Please choose an option—FacebookGoogleTwitterInstagramYelpYoutubeTelegramOther If referred, enter your referral’s Mobile No Comments I acknowledge that I have read and consented to Shypr Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy and processing of my personal data for communication purposes, according to them, GDPR, and relevant local legislation, as well as to receive email correspondence or phone calls from Shypr.
